name: Currency Collector
description:
This game was originally made for Juice Jam 2023, but not submitted because I didn't have enough time. The version that you are playing right now is the same version that I would have submitted to the jam, with a few minor additions to make the game actually playable (adding the credits page and fixing some bugs).

Obviously the game is nowhere close to where I wanted it to be, but I think it is still relatively enjoyable and I hope you feel the same.
